name: Altium Designer PCB Project Structure
summary: A PRJPCBSTRUCTURE file is a project data file created by Altium Designer, a CAD application used to design printed circuit boards (PCBs). When a Designer user creates a new project ( .PRJPCB file), Designer creates an accompanying PRJPCBSTRUCTURE file. This file contains information about the project's hierarchy.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
